Title: The Private Life of Henry VIII.
Cast: Charles Laughton, Robert Donat, Franklin Dyall, Miles Mander, Laurence Hanray, William Austin, John Loder, Claud Allister, Gibb McLaughlin, Sam Livesey, Merle Oberon, Wendy Barrie, Elsa Lanchester, Binnie Barnes, Everley Gregg
Plot: Tells how King Henry VIII came to marry five more times after his divorce from his first wife. This movie tells the story of King Henry VIII and the last five of his six wives. Set almost entirely within the royal castle, it begins just before the death of his second wife (Anne Boleyn) and ends just after his sixth wedding (to Catherine or Katherine Parr). Written by Anonymous
Keywords: king, king henry viii, divorce, anne boleyn, jane seymour
Location: Hampton Court Palace, East Molesey, Surrey, England, UK
Actors: Charles Laughton, Robert Donat, Franklin Dyall
Writer: Lajos Biró (story) (as Lajos Biro), Arthur Wimperis (story) | 1 more credit »
Description: Directed by Alexander Korda.  With Charles Laughton, Robert Donat, Franklin Dyall, Miles Mander. Tells how King Henry VIII came to marry five more times after his divorce from his first wife.
